title: [Massive] Design Education Feedback Competency Enhancement Through Multimodal Peer Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of design processes, experience with Google Docs/Zoom, and participation in peer reviews
context.additional_context: A course for preservice teachers to practice effective assessment and feedback methods in design education

learning_goals: Learners can systematically evaluate peers' design work using multimodal tools (chat, documents, real-time discussions).
Learners can apply expert-level critique standards while structuring and documenting feedback.
Learners can strategically differentiate and utilize various communication channels (public/private) when providing feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
